title: Savage eSports looking for Diamond+ Mid laner
body:
Savage eSports are a newly formed organisation run by myself 'Nestay' with the ambition of creating a ranked 5's team that will be able to compete in Tournaments and LANS at the highest possible competitive level around OCE.

At the moment our roster is filled, all but one role (Mid).

Currently the roster stands as;
Top: Ciouz - Diamond V
Jungle: Pure - Diamond III
Mid:
ADC: PromBear - Diamond V
Support: Defqons - Diamond IV

Owner/Manager: Nestay
Team Captain: PromBear

This is a serious team, so if you're not dedicated please do NOT apply.

To be eligible you MUST be minimum Diamond V, if you're not please do NOT apply.

Application:

IGN:
Rank:
Location:
Champ Pool:
Times available:
Days available: 
Why do you want to join:

Thank you for taking your time to read this thread and fill out your application!

replies.body:
IGN: Netero
Rank: D5 Was previously d2 but decayed/lost interest in ranked.
Location: Brisbane
Champ Pool: Ori, Xerath, Syndra, Jayce, Ahri, Liss, Kass, Veig etc.
Times available: Most afternoons until late.
Days available: Every day im on basically, either watching streams or playing something else.
Why do you want to join: I feel like i need to find a group of guys to play with to increase my willingness to play ranked/competitive league. When the season restarts ill be playing alot more but i feel like if i had a team i could play with as well i could grow as a player even more and become even better. 

I am willing to learn, but in saying that i want a team who will actually play and not just once every second day. If i actually join a team i want it to be serious.
